trans-unit.source: Represents a cubic Bezier curve drawn between two points.
trans-unit.target: 表示兩個點之間繪製的三次方貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> object to store BezierSegment objects and other segments.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>物件來儲存 BezierSegment 物件和其他區段。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: A cubic Bezier curve is defined by four points: a start point, an end point (<xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point3%2A>), and two control points (<xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2%2A>).The BezierSegment class does not contain a property for the starting point of the curve; it only defines the end point.
trans-unit.target: 三次方貝茲曲線由四個點所定義︰ 起點、 結束點 (<xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point3%2A>) 和兩個控制點 (<xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point1%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2%2A>)。BezierSegment 類別未包含曲線; 的起始點的屬性只會定義結束點。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point1%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point3%2A>

trans-unit.source: The beginning point of the curve is the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> to which the BezierSegment is added.
trans-unit.target: 曲線開始點是目前的點<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>加入 BezierSegment。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve.
trans-unit.target: 兩個控制點三次方貝茲曲線的行為與磁鐵吸引部份功能原本是直線和曲線。

trans-unit.source: The first control point, <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point1%2A>, affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point, <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2%2A>, affects the ending portion of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 第一個控制點， <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point1%2A>，會影響開頭曲線部分; 的第二個控制點<xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2%2A>，會影響曲線的結束部分。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point1%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，曲線不一定通過其中一個控制點。每個控制點會移動它的部分向本身，但不是能透過本身的行。

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features A BezierSegment is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: 可凍結功能 BezierSegment 是一種<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關資訊<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，例如凍結和複製，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: A cubic Bezier curve is defined by four points: a start point, an end point (`point3`), and two control points (`point1` and `point2`).
trans-unit.target: 三次方貝茲曲線由四個點所定義︰ 起點、 結束點 (`point3`)，和兩個控制點 (`point1`和`point2`)。

trans-unit.source: This method does not enable you to specify the beginning point of the curve; the curve begins at the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> object to which the <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment> is added.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會讓您指定的曲線; 起點曲線開始在目前點的<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment>加入。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve.
trans-unit.target: 兩個控制點三次方貝茲曲線的行為與磁鐵吸引部份功能原本是直線和曲線。

trans-unit.source: The first control point, `point1`, affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point, `point2`, affects the ending portion of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 第一個控制點， `point1`，會影響開頭曲線部分; 的第二個控制點`point2`，會影響曲線的結束部分。

trans-unit.source: Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，曲線不一定通過其中一個控制點。每個控制點會移動它的部分向本身，但不是能透過本身的行。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment"></xref> class with the specified control points, end point, and stroke option.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment"></xref>具有指定的控制點、 結束點及筆劃選項類別。

trans-unit.source: A cubic Bezier curve is defined by four points: a start point, an end point (`point3`), and two control points (`point1` and `point2`).
trans-unit.target: 三次方貝茲曲線由四個點所定義︰ 起點、 結束點 (`point3`)，和兩個控制點 (`point1`和`point2`)。

trans-unit.source: This method does not enable you to specify the beginning point of the curve; the curve begins at the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> object to which the <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment> is added.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會讓您指定的曲線; 起點曲線開始在目前點的<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment>加入。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve.
trans-unit.target: 兩個控制點三次方貝茲曲線的行為與磁鐵吸引部份功能原本是直線和曲線。

trans-unit.source: The first control point, `point1`, affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point, `point2`, affects the ending portion of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 第一個控制點， `point1`，會影響開頭曲線部分; 的第二個控制點`point2`，會影響曲線的結束部分。

trans-unit.source: Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，曲線不一定通過其中一個控制點。每個控制點會移動它的部分向本身，但不是能透過本身的行。

trans-unit.source: The first control point, which determines the beginning portion of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 第一個控制點，決定曲線的開始部分。

trans-unit.source: The second control point, which determines the ending portion of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 第二個控制點，決定曲線的結束部分。

trans-unit.source: The point to which the curve is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 點會繪製曲線。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to stroke the curve when a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref> is used to render the segment; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>繪製曲線時<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>是用來呈現該區段，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first control point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定曲線的第一個控制點。

trans-unit.source: The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve.
trans-unit.target: 兩個控制點三次方貝茲曲線的行為與磁鐵吸引部份功能原本是直線和曲線。

trans-unit.source: The first control point, Point1, affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point, <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2%2A>, affects the ending portion of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 第一個控制點，Point1 影響的開頭部分的曲線。第二個控制點， <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2%2A>，會影響曲線的結束部分。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，曲線不一定通過其中一個控制點。每個控制點會移動它的部分向本身，但不是能透過本身的行。

trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The first control point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 曲線第一個控制點。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point1*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point1*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point1*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the second control point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定曲線的第二個控制點。

trans-unit.source: The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve.
trans-unit.target: 兩個控制點三次方貝茲曲線的行為與磁鐵吸引部份功能原本是直線和曲線。

trans-unit.source: The first control point, <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point1%2A>, affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point, Point2, affects the ending portion of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 第一個控制點， <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point1%2A>，影響的開頭部分曲線; 第二個控制點，Point2 影響曲線的結束部分。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point1%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，曲線不一定通過其中一個控制點。每個控制點會移動它的部分向本身，但不是能透過本身的行。

trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The second control point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 曲線第二個控制點。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the end point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定曲線的結束點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment> class does not contain a property for the starting point of the curve; it only defines the end point.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment>類別不包含曲線開始點的內容，只會定義結束點。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment>

trans-unit.source: The beginning point of the curve is the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> to which the <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment> is added.
trans-unit.target: 曲線開始點是目前的點<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment>加入。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: The end point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 曲線結束點。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point3*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point3*>
